original_body_lines: The Sri Lanka-Canada Business Council of the Ceylon Chamber of Commerce, in partnership with the High Commission of Canada in Sri Lanka, has concluded a successful event, the Canada Education Expo – 2023 recently with a participation of over 2,000 prospective students, parents, and professionals to explore the diverse educational opportunities offered in Canada.

High Commissioner of Canada Eric Walsh said that Sri Lankan students considering studying in Canada stand out in terms of quality of education, quality of life, cost competitiveness and a welcoming and diverse environment for students of all nationalities.

The Sri Lanka-Canada Business Council of the Ceylon Chamber of Commerce President Priyantha Chandrasekara said that this event served as a stepping stone towards a brighter future filled with educational growth, professional success and enduring partnerships between our two countries.
